summary: Defines a CloudFormation-specific block class used by the graph builder to encapsulate template elements. The class extends a generic block, adding helpers for property access, sanitizing identifiers with special characters, handling breadcrumb metadata for variable rendering, and recording modifications to the underlying data.
business_intent: Enable accurate modeling of CloudFormation templates as graph structures so that downstream security and compliance checks can traverse, analyze, and reason about resources and their relationships.
